properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 9:30PM CST until February 14 at 10:34PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warnings continue for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...Oliver Lock and Dam... and Selden Lock and Dam...

.Flood Warnings continue along the Black Warrior River due to expected
rainfall amounts between 4 and 6 inches upstream through the day on
Tuesday. Additional heavy rainfall is possible through the end of
this upcoming week which will cause water levels to remain elevated
or increase further. Interests should closely monitor the latest
river forecasts through the upcoming week.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* from Tuesday afternoon to Friday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 8:30 PM Sunday the stage was 119.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Tuesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 137.8 feet by Wednesday evening.
* Impact...At 135 feet...Numerous camphouses and some permanent
residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff.
* Impact...At 140 feet...Flooding of portions of Jack Warner
Parkway can be expected. Some industrial property may also begin
to flood along Jack Warner Parkway. Residential flooding will
commence in areas southwest of Tuscaloosa at stages above 140
feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
